author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two men posing as policemen cheated two women at Tatabad here on Monday.

They approached Jayalakshmi (53), and her sister Rajammal (48), of Sundapalayam, who were walking towards a hospital asking them to safeguard their jewellery.

They told them to keep the gold chains covered in a piece of paper and volunteered to do so.

When they reached home they found that the packet given to them contained stones.The police said that one of them was wearing a chain weighing about 32 gm, and the other about 24 gm. The police were trying to collect CCTV recordings to identify the accused.
title: Women cheated
